actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States lowering the age requirements for membership in the Houses of Congress.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no person who shall have reached the age of twenty-two years shall be disqualified to be a Representative on account of age. Provides no person who shall have reached the age of twenty-seven years shall be disqualified to be a Senator on account of age.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States lowering the age requirements for membership in the Houses of Congress.
